DOC.brief_summary: This blind observer randomize control trial compare two nebulizer device . The objective study evaluate efficacy two different nebulizer .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Breath-Enhanced T-Piece Nebulizers Children With Acute Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator hypothesize albuterol deliver breath-enhanced nebulizer lead statistically great improvement FEV1 compare equivalent dose deliver via standard t-piece nebulizer . The primary aim study change force expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) patient present urban pediatric emergency department moderate severe acute asthma exacerbation utilize two nebulizer . Secondary aim include evaluation hospital admission rate , emergency department ( ED ) length stay ( LOS ) , change asthma severity score , vital sign change , medication side effect , total quantity albuterol give ED . A distal aim study perform cost analysis ; though investigator likely need clinical trial utilize multiple dose administration order accurately analyze cost .

Pediatric Asthma Score 0 Pregnancy breastfeed Immediate resuscitation require Chronic lung disease ( asthma ) Congenital heart disease Neuromuscular disease Suspected intrathoracic foreign body Allergy contraindication study medication
